meanings.definition: A person or thing that thunders loudly.
meanings.sent1: The thunderers in the sky scared the little child.
meanings.sent2: The thunderers at the concert made everyone cover their ears.
meanings.sent3: The thunderers in the movie were actually just special effects.
meanings.sent4: The thunderers of nature echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The thunderers of the storm shook the windows with their power.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things that make a loud, rumbling noise like thunder.
meanings.sent1: The thunderers of the marching band could be heard from far away.
meanings.sent2: The thunderers of the stampeding elephants caused a commotion.
meanings.sent3: The thunderers of the bowling alley were on a winning streak.
meanings.sent4: The thunderers of the protest demanded to be heard.
meanings.sent5: The thunderers of the waterfall drowned out all other sounds.
